elements.name: question1
elements.title: How does advertising differ from sales promotion?
elements.correctAnswer: Advertising usually takes place outside the store, sales promotion inside the store.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What are the principles of advertising?
elements.correctAnswer:
Advertising should be clear.
Advertising should be true.
Advertising should be economical.
Advertising should be effective.
Advertising should be up-to-date.
Advertising should be repeated.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What do the letters in the AIDA formula stand for?
elements.correctAnswer: A: Attention, I: Interest, D: Desire, A: Action
